INSERT INTO PROD_BOM_PLM ( ID, VOUCHER_NO, BOM_NO, PROD_NO, MID_PROD_NO, MAKE_DATE, VERSIONS, MAKE_EMP, STATUS, BOM_STATUS, START_DATE, LOSE_DATE, DELETED, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, COMPANY_ID, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{voucherNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bomNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midProdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{makeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{versions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{makeEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bomStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_PROD_BOM_PLM.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE PROD_BOM_PLM
VOUCHER_NO = #{voucherNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
BOM_NO = #{bomNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROD_NO = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MID_PROD_NO = #{midProdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAKE_DATE = #{makeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VERSIONS = #{versions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAKE_EMP = #{makeEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BOM_STATUS = #{bomStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOSE_DATE = #{loseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
